metadata.title: CVE-2015-0853 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
svn-workbench 1.6.2 and earlier on a system with xeyes installed allowslocal users to execute arbitrary commands by using the "Command Shell" menuitem while in the directory trunk/$(xeyes).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

svn-workbench - 1.7.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: svn-workbench package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.0-2').
